description: Number of entries in n-th row of Pascal's triangle divisible by 3.
comments: a(n) = n + 1 - A206424(n) - A227428(n); number of zeros in row n of triangle A083093. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 11 2013
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
example: When n=3 the row is 1,3,3,1 so a(3) = 2.
maple: p:=proc(n) local ct, k: ct:=0: for k from 0 to n do if binomial(n,k) mod 3 = 0 then else ct:=ct+1 fi od: end: seq(n+1-p(n),n=0..83); (Deutsch)
prog: (Haskell)a062296 = sum . map ((1 -) . signum) . a083093_row-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 11 2013
author: Ahmed Fares (ahmedfares(AT)my-deja.com), Jul 02 2001
